title: Bug 120922: 'Dirty Page' behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improvement
description: Bug 120922: 'Dirty Page' behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improvement. Other pages cannot be used until the source is saved. The user needs to figure out how to save or discard their changes. The dialog is titled 'Error'.
OB: When editing the XML in the 'source' view of the Layout Editor and then attempting to switch back to the Layout view, an error message is displayed indicating that the changes need to be saved. However, the error message does not provide clear instructions and the user is left to determine how to save or discard the changes.
EB: The XML Report Design should be updated in a more typical and user-friendly manner. The dialog title should be improved and the quotes should be removed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the XML Report Designer.
2. Edit the XML in the 'source' view of the Layout Editor.
3. Attempt to switch back to the Layout view. 

Expected behavior: 
The user should be prompted to save or discard their changes in a clear and intuitive manner, without any quotation marks in the dialog title.
